hero.description: YANSY is the trusted platform for enterprise teams to manage projects, communicate with clients, and track progress in real-time. Built for companies that demand excellence.
hero.title: YANSY
hero.subtitle: Full-stack product development for companies ready to scale
hero.descriptionFull: We build digital products that drive measurable business growth through strategic development, enterprise-grade engineering, and user-centered design.

why.title: Why Choose YANSY?
why.subtitle: We understand the challenges you face. Here's how we solve them.

problems.title: Common Challenges
problems.time: Wasting time on scattered tools and manual updates
problems.organization: Struggling to keep projects organized and on track
problems.visibility: Lack of visibility into project progress and analytics

solutions.efficiency: Streamlined workflows that save time and reduce errors
solutions.collaboration: Centralized platform for seamless team collaboration

features.title: Core Features

clientCommunication.title: Client Communication
clientCommunication.description: Dedicated client portal for seamless communication and transparency throughout the project lifecycle.

realTimeMessaging.title: Real-time Messaging
realTimeMessaging.description: Instant messaging system with threaded conversations for efficient team and client communication.

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.description: Track project performance, team productivity, and client engagement with comprehensive analytics.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: Enterprise-grade security with encrypted data, secure authentication, and role-based access control.

multilanguage.title: Multi-language Support
multilanguage.description: Full support for English and Arabic with RTL layout. More languages coming soon.

trust.title: Trusted by Enterprise Teams
trust.subtitle: Built with security, reliability, and scalability in mind

security.title: Security First
security.description: Your data is protected with industry-leading security measures and encryption.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Ready
enterprise.description: Designed for companies and teams of all sizes. Scalable, reliable, and professional.

reliable.title: Reliable & Scalable

about.title: We deliver measurable
about.description: Through strategic product development, enterprise-grade engineering, and user-centered design, we build digital products that drive growth, efficiency, and competitive advantage for medium and large enterprises.
about.services: Product Strategy | Enterprise Engineering | UX/UI Design | Growth Optimization

team.title: Built by specialists
team.subtitle: Our team combines deep expertise across product strategy, design, and engineering. We focus on quality over scale — senior talent delivering enterprise-grade solutions for growing companies.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce that converts
ecommerce.description: High-performance platforms built for scale. From product discovery to checkout, every touchpoint optimized for conversion.
ecommerce.features: Headless architecture. Seamless integrations. Lightning fast.

work1.title: Nexus Commerce
work1.description: A growing e-commerce brand needed a platform that could handle rapid scale without performance degradation. We architected a headless commerce solution with microservices infrastructure, enabling seamless third-party integrations and real-time inventory management. The platform now supports high-traffic periods, maintains sub-second load times, and provides a foundation for long-term growth.

work2.title: Vault Analytics
work2.description: A B2B SaaS company required a data platform that could process complex analytics while remaining intuitive for non-technical users. We built a scalable architecture with real-time data processing, custom visualization components, and role-based access controls. The platform enables teams to make data-driven decisions faster, with enterprise-grade security and compliance built-in from day one.

work3.title: Aria Studio
work3.description: A creative agency needed a digital workspace that streamlined collaboration across distributed teams while maintaining a premium user experience. We designed and developed a unified platform with real-time collaboration features, intuitive project management, and seamless file sharing. The platform reduces friction in creative workflows and enables teams to deliver higher-quality work more efficiently.

fast.title: Fast
fast.description: Performance is not optional. Every millisecond matters. We build systems that feel instant.

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: Security built into every layer. From infrastructure to code. No compromises.

whatWeBuild.title: Some of our services
whatWeBuild.subtitle: We build custom digital solutions tailored to your needs — even if they're not listed here

websites.title: Websites
websites.description: Brand experiences that leave lasting impressions.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce

medicalWebsites.description: Professional websites for clinics and hospitals showcasing services and doctors.

medicalBooking.title: Medical Booking Systems
medicalBooking.description: Smart booking platforms with advanced scheduling and auto-reminders.

dashboards.title: Professional Dashboards
dashboards.description: Comprehensive management systems for data, reports, and operations.

deliveryApps.title: Delivery Apps
deliveryApps.description: Complete delivery platforms with real-time tracking and secure payments.

customSolutions.title: Custom Solutions
customSolutions.description: Have a different idea? We turn any concept into a successful digital product.
